sentences.en: "Because of these impacts, we'd like to know what happens to these nitrogen oxides in nighttime air, where do they go, what do they do," Thornton said.
sentences.cn: 桑顿说：“由于这些影响，我们想知道夜间空气中的这些氮氧化物发生什么变化，到那里去，会有什么影响。”

sentences.en: A prescription antidiuretic can cut down on nighttime urination if this is the only problem.
sentences.cn: 如果这是唯一的问题，抗利尿的处方可以减少夜间排尿。

sentences.en: And dost thou go to meet him in the nighttime? "
sentences.cn: 你是在夜里去见他的 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Daytime historical views turn into nighttime romance over a twinkling Paris.
sentences.cn: 白日洋溢着历史气息的景色在转瞬间的巴黎变换成夜色下的浪漫.

sentences.en: Do you work in the daytime or at nighttime?
sentences.cn: 你是白天工作还是夜间工作?

sentences.en: During the riots last year, the nighttime patrol force was beefed up with volunteers.
sentences.cn: 去年骚乱期间志愿者增加了夜间巡逻力量。

sentences.en: Every day avoids a sunlight corpse to loaf likely in the nighttime.
sentences.cn: 每天躲避着阳光像个僵尸般地在黑夜里游荡.

sentences.en: Explore constellations and the nighttime sky under our planetarium dome.
sentences.cn: 请于我们的天文馆圆顶下探索星宿与夜空.

sentences.en: I don't eat at nighttime unless I am very hungry.
sentences.cn: 夜间我不吃东西,除非我很饿.

sentences.en: I really very want to summon you in this tranquil nighttime sky.
sentences.cn: 我真的很想在这宁静的夜空里呼唤你.

sentences.en: It's nighttime, yet I saw more clearlythan duringthe day.
sentences.cn: 现在是晚上, 我可以比白天看得更清楚.

sentences.en: Most of them had never seen an owl even at nighttime.
sentences.cn: 他们中的很多人从未在夜晚见过猫头鹰.

sentences.en: Once it was thought that nighttime dreams interfered with our needed rest.
sentences.cn: 人们曾一度认为夜间做梦干扰我们所需要的休息.

sentences.en: The increase is larger at nighttime and over land area.
sentences.cn: 夜间温度以及大陆温度上升幅度明显.

sentences.en: The nighttime air was comfortably cool.
The nighttime airglow, or nightglow, correspond to the intensity of a candle at 100 m distance.
sentences.cn: 夜间辉光或夜辉相当于在100米距离的一支烛光的强度.

sentences.en: The nighttime sky spot stars, the street corner lifts water Malone.
sentences.cn: 夜空点点繁星, 街头车水马龙.

sentences.en: The stars can only be seen shining in the sky in the nighttime.
sentences.cn: 只有在晚上才能看见星星在天空中闪烁.

words.tran_cn: 三K党员；美国南部夜间骑马为非作歹的人
夜里徘徊者，梦游病患者；夜盗，夜行动物
